From: "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@...>

Melchana's anger against the slagging power diversion core was being 
translated into solid slashes from her forearm fixed blades as she fought 
against vine-formed simulations. She cut one in half as it was jumping down 
on her, and fired 25 times her dustfire, causing another one to erode and 
fall down. She was in the rage of the battle. She could live all of her life 
in that state. She went back to her lioness mode and went for the simulated 
jugular of some more vine-fighters. She couldn't believe what her brother 
had done. He had brought the key to vector sigma, the one thing that could 
erase organic and techno-organic life and had reformatted an entire 
continent. And one of the first thing she learned, Daemos had went off to 
mercenary life and he engaged in a gladiator league. A sad note passed on 
her face, but it quickly disappeared as she doubled her ferocity against her 
vegetal oponents. She would be finished soon enough anyways, so why waste 
time thinking?
